array.name: quotes
array.item: You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.
With the new day comes new strength and new thoughts.
If you can dream it, you can do it.
Either you run the day or the day runs you.
In order to succeed, we must first believe that we can.
Well done is better than well said.
What you do today can improve all your tomorrows.
A goal is a dream with a deadline.
The most effective way to do it, is to do it.
The hardships that I encountered in the past will help me succeed in the future.
The more we do, the more we can do.
You miss 100% of the shots you don\'t take.
Challenge yourself with something you know you could never do, and what you\'ll find is that you can overcome anything.
In between goals is a thing called life, that has to be lived and enjoyed.
If you want to make your dreams come true, the first thing you have to do is wake up.
People often say that motivation doesn\'t last. Well, neither does bathing. That\'s why we recommend it daily.
It always seems impossible until it\'s done.
Resolutions were made to be tackled.
If you\'re bored with life - you don\'t get up every morning with a burning desire to do things - you don\'t have enough goals.
If you can\’t fly then run, if you can\’t run then walk, if you can\’t walk then crawl, but whatever you do you have to keep moving forward.
If you fail to prepare, you\'re prepared to fail.
